name: PixBit
description: PixBit is a small game in which your objective is to survive running into an enemy, collect as many crystals as possible and to keep the enemies from reaching one of the points
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP or higher DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 100 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or higher DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 100 MB available space

reviews.review_text: Don't be suckered into this crap, it's a clone/mod of super crate box, even crappier than the real one on Steam. It's got crap performance despite being 2D pixels, the weapons suck, the controls suck, the English sucks, and you sometimes just die for no reason. Deserved to languish unloved and forever alone on Greenlight, not rip people off on Steam.  Buy only for the cards, on ultra-deep discount, if you're into that.
